issue.title: [Developer] PR merge script has "master" target ref hard-coded
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6376](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6376). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If the target ref of a PR is something other than master, we should merge PRs into that branch

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6376?focusedCommentId=16918120) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5220
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5220>
